sentences.en: All the attractions of the peninsula beckon.
sentences.cn: 半岛上的各处景点无不令人心驰神往。

sentences.en: Cancun is in Mexico, on the Yucatan Peninsula.
sentences.cn: 坎昆在墨西哥的尤卡坦半岛.

sentences.en: Dalian is in the south of the Liaodong Peninsula.
sentences.cn: 大连位于辽东半岛南部.

sentences.en: Detectives have run into a conspiracy of silence in the tight-knit communities of the peninsula.
sentences.cn: 侦探们犯了难，半岛上各个群体抱成一团，达成了保持缄默的密约。

sentences.en: Elamites reach the gateway to the Sinai peninsula and its Spaceport.
sentences.cn: 埃兰人到达了西奈半岛的通路,以及它的太空船发射降落场.

sentences.en: His house is located on the tip of the peninsula.
sentences.cn: 他的房子位于半岛的顶端.

sentences.en: I had walked around the entire peninsula.
It is difficult to imagine how the North and South could ever agree on a formula to unify the divided peninsula.
sentences.cn: 很难想象南北双方在统一半岛的方案上究竟怎样才能达成一致。

sentences.en: Poverty, high prices, and hard times froze the stony peninsula.
sentences.cn: 贫困 、 高昂的物价和艰难的岁月使这座荒凉的半岛毫无生气.

sentences.en: The boat was anchored off the northern coast of the peninsula.
sentences.cn: 这艘船停泊在离该半岛北部海岸不远的地方。

sentences.en: The implications for the Korean peninsula, and the broader region, are historic.
sentences.cn: 对朝鲜半岛乃至更广泛地区来说, 影响是历史性的.

sentences.en: The resort on the Yucat á n peninsula a popular vacation destination for Europeans.
sentences.cn: 度假村在尤卡坦半岛是著名的度假胜地为欧洲人.

sentences.en: The union of the entire Iberian Peninsula seemed, for the time being , to have been achieved.
sentences.cn: 整个伊比利亚半岛的统一事业似乎暂获成功.

sentences.en: Two radar units suspended from huge balloons provide low - altitude coverage of the entire peninsula.
sentences.cn: 悬挂在巨大气球下面的两套雷达把整个半岛的 低空 都置于它们的探测范围之内.

sentences.en: Yes, this is Peninsula. May I have your name?
sentences.cn: 是的, 这是半岛餐馆. 请告诉您的姓名.

phrases.tran_cn: 科拉半岛（俄罗斯西北部）

trans.tran_cn: 半岛，[史]伊比利亚半岛，（第一次世界大战中指）加利波利半岛，（第一次世界大战中指）加利波利半岛
trans.tran_en: a piece of land almost completely surrounded by water but joined to a large area of land
